channel.title: vincentbz on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: The Product Page - Evolution Revolution
item.description: A long time ago, in a galaxy not so far away, we packed PrestaShop with much needed functionalities in its core. The aim was to propose the best ecommerce solution, with the biggest functional scope, answering to almost all of the merchants’ needs — all that while still being free. And we can say it’s been a success! Features are one of the reasons why merchants choose PrestaShop when they want to create their online shop.
